fields.name: Adejoke
fields.body: Excellent tutor. She takes her time to take you through the study process and gives basic and simple tips to guide one through to get good band scores.

fields.summary: Become a master of speaking in the British methods and accent.

outlines.data: Facts about preparing for the IELTS Speaking Test and some introduction to standard British speaking.
Master the essential aspects of proper English grammar, fluency, vocabulary and pronunciation.
Understanding the Individual long turn, making notes, beginning your talk, saying more, ending your talk.
How to extend your answers, discuss topics, talk about past, present and future, comparison and clarity etc.

fields.heading: Cancellation policy
fields.body: If you change your mind, you'd get a refund if you cancel 1 month before the first lesson.

fields.description: Ideal if you're only available on weekends

fields.summary: Master the act of listening perfectly and smash the IELTS Listening module

outlines.data: How to prepare for the IELTS Listening Test and how to listen for the main idea or factual information.
outlines.highlighted: how to listen for the main idea

outlines.data: Sharpen your listening ability with listening strategies for before, during and after the listening exercise.
How to answer multiple choice and short answer questions, and master form and table completion.
How to synchronize your listening and reading pace, follow the speakers and keep track of time.
Master how to complete sentences, recognize each speaker, their accent, opinion and attitude.
Academic monologues, completing notes, listening for signpost language, identifying paraphrases etc.

fields.description: Ideal if you're only available on weekends

fields.name: Taiwo
fields.body: Amarachi is a great teacher, tutor, mentor and confidant.  Throughout the lessons, she provided me with detailed instructions, proper supervision, constructive feedback and warm encouragement.  I will always be grateful for her support.

fields.name: Ayodele
fields.body: Chidi is an exceptional tutor. He makes learning easy.

fields.name: Jessica
fields.body: He was born to teach ielts (lol). I had the best experience. Thank you!

fields.name: Ogundipe
fields.body: The delivery was excellent. The methodology was perfect. I would surely recommend him to other clients.

fields.description: Ideal if you're only available on weekends

fields.name: Christopher
fields.body: Noah is a very good and patient tutor. He has a remarkable strength in speaking and listening, his construct for every sentence he makes is great. He is reliable.

body.heading_aux: We deliver the best IELTS results
body.heading_main: Get above 7.5 in all sections of IELTS
body.pricing_subtext: Select a class that fits your schedule and purpose
body.outline_sub_text: Lessons cover all 4 modules of the IELTS test using in-dept techniques and a lot of practice guaranteed to help you get a high score
body.curriculum_subtext: Lesson cover all 4 modules of the IELTS test using in-depth techniques and a lot of practice guaranteed to help you to get a high score
body.heading_aux_subtext: Our expert tutors have helped people like you pass their IELTS exams
body.heading_main_subtext: Join a class of like-minded students and study with a proven IELTS expert with high success rate.
body.call_to_action_subtext: Your success is our utmost happiness at Tuteria. We’re offering a full refund to any student who scores 9.0 IELTS band.

summary.data: Hi, I’m Chidiebere. Helping students pass IELTS is what I do best. I have taught numerous students preparing for IELTS, Cambridge, IGCSE and SAT Reading & Writing Sections who got admission into their respective schools abroad or have migrated to the UK, US, Canada and New Zealand. I cover the four fundamental aspects of IELTS, with in-depth explanation and a lot of practice to ensure you succeed.

fields.description: Recommended plan for your busy schedule
Everyday lessons ideal for intense preparation
Everyday lessons ideal for intense preparation

fields.heading: ID Verification
fields.body: You'll need to come along with an ID so we can confirm your identity when you join the class.

fields.heading: What if I want a private tutor instead?
fields.description: If you prefer to study with a private tutor, click {Link: https://www.tuteria.com/s/ielts-tutors/ here to get an IELTS tutor} near you.
Recommended plan for your busy schedule

fields.name: Chisom
fields.body: Mr. Chidiebere is a professional tutor who believes in excellence and ensures that his student give nothing short of their best. He keeps to time and is very passionate about his job.I would definitely recommend Chidi to anyone writing IELTS.

fields.description: Everyday lessons ideal for intense preparation

fields.heading: What to come with
fields.body: You don't need to come with any material, just com prepared and willing to learn

fields.name: Chinelo
fields.body: Chidiebere was always punctual and professional. He clearly knows his onions and teaches with ease. More importantly, he understood my challenges and tackled them head on. My result is out and I reached my desired score. Thank you!

fields.heading: How does payment work?
fields.description: We require a full payment before your slot can be confirmed in the class. Once a class is filled up, we automatically close registration for that class. You can pay online or by bank transfer.

fields.name: Gozie
fields.body: He was excellent in delivering the IELTS lectures. I really understood every point within a short duration.

fields.heading: Can I pay at the venue?
fields.description: We do not accept payment at the venue. Payment must be made before the first lesson. Classes usually fill up quickly, so we advice you make payments on time.

fields.summary: Master the art of writing in accurate error-free IELTS English

outlines.data: Facts about the IELTS Writing Test
Introduction to Writing Task 1, visuals, analysing and describing key features.
Focus on language, describing data, selecting and grouping Information
Writing Task 2, question analysis, brainstorming and planning practice, paragraph structure.
Writing the introduction, complex sentences, essays and conclusions.

fields.heading: Is there provision for makeup lessons?
fields.description: Sadly, we can’t accommodate makeup lessons. If you miss a lesson, we recommend scheduling a private tutoring session with the teacher to cover the missed material.

summary.data: I am well acquainted with the British and American curricula. I have studied this system over the years and can use it to impact knowledge. I can prepare students for Cambridge A'Level Exams, SATs, TOEFL and IELTS. I’m here to ensure you pass your IELTS exams in flying colors. Join my class today

fields.name: Chibuzor
fields.body: She came early and patiently answer all questions. Also, gave us tips on how to tackle the problems.

summary.data: Hi, I’m Amarachi. I’m specially trained to prepare you for TOEFL/IELTS with Educational Testing Service (ETS) in New Jersey, USA. My lessons involve lots of practice and detailed explanation targeted at increasing your score. I conduct series of mock exams to help you get familiar with the actual test which gives you unrivaled confidence and always results in excellent band scores.

I am well acquainted with the British and American curricula. I have studied this system over the years and can use it to impact knowledge. I can prepare students for Cambridge A'Level Exams, SATs, TOEFL and IELTS. I’m here to ensure you pass your IELTS exams in flying colors. Join my class today

fields.name: Adewale
fields.body: Everything about Adeyinka is superb. Thanks to Tuteria and thanks to Adeyinka for the tips.

fields.heading: Group size
fields.body: The group can only take a maximum of 15 slots to keep it effective, fun and engaging

fields.name: Ifeoma
fields.body: Noah's lessons were very helpful. He is a patient and knowledgeable teacher. I was able to practice a lot of IELTS questions with him, and he helped me develop confidence for the exam and I scored a 7.5 overall band score. Thanks!

fields.name: Oreoluwa
fields.body: He is very reasonable in his teaching, attentive and listens . Takes his time to teach . Kudos to him.

summary.data: Hi, I’m Noah. Having taught IELTS for over 6 years, I have ample experience as an IELTS instructor. I teach the four aspects: listening, reading, speaking and writing skills. I make my students familiar with the IELTS test format including how to structure suitable answers to the different possible question types you would encounter in the exam through guided, rigorous teaching and sample tests so that you can quickly grasp what you need to know to pass the exam.

fields.name: Aghimien
fields.body: He is very patient, speaks very fluently and is ready to assist you to improve your communication skills.

fields.name: Oluwatosin
fields.body: He is a very time conscious tutor who was punctual throughout the lessons. Such an excellent tutor! I will gladly recommend Chidiebere over and over to anyone who requires an IELTS tutor.. He is very good at tutoring IELTS.

fields.name: Chinedu
fields.body: He was precise, skilled and timely. He made learning fun and enjoyable without missing the details. We were glad we chose him. A great asset as a tutor. Well done.

fields.description: Recommended plan for your busy schedule

fields.name: Shonibare
fields.body: Pleased with everything. Very stimulating lectures and brilliantly taught. The lecturer's teaching is well organized and presented, which helped me to accept the new knowledge quickly. Great lectures. Energetic. Great structure. Thank You for everything!

summary.data: Hi, I’m Adeyinka. I have a Masters degree in English Language with a sound, in-depth understanding of the IELTS curriculum and grading, having prepared students for over 5 years. I teach the four macro skills in IELTS: Writing, Speaking, Listening and Reading, conduct ongoing diagnostic assessment and provide individualized feedback which helps my students succeed. Join my class today.

fields.summary: Perfect your IELTS Reading and answer questions without error

outlines.data: Understanding the IELTS Reading Test, distinguishing facts from opinions, perfecting spelling and grammar.
Reading skills and strategies, how to skim and scan, identifying paraphrase and references.
How to answer sentence completion and short answer questions.
Learn how to label diagrams, summarize charts and note ideas and identify information, views and claims etc.

fields.name: Akinola
fields.body: Adeyinka is a very sound IELTS tutor, with proper understanding of the four basic skills. He was able to provide in depth knowledge of the course within a short time frame. He was able to proffer solutions to help me achieve a better result.

fields.heading: Can I cancel or reschedule a class?
fields.description: You can cancel or reschedule at least 2 weeks before lessons start and get a full refund, otherwise a 50% fee applies. Please note that you can’t cancel or reschedule once lessons have began.

summary.data: I am well acquainted with the British and American curricula. I have studied this system over the years and can use it to impact knowledge. I can prepare students for Cambridge A'Level Exams, SATs, TOEFL and IELTS. I’m here to ensure you pass your IELTS exams in flying colors. Join my class today

fields.heading: Do I also get study materials?
fields.description: Yes. You'll get up-to-date IELTS study materials and practice tests sent to your email for free! We prepare students for both the Academic and General Training tests.
